hero.title: Professional Real Estate Appraisals Made Simple
hero.subtitle: Valea Max helps you manage your property appraisals with precision and efficiency. Detailed inspections, comprehensive reports, and intelligent automation.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Professional tools for quality real estate appraisals

reports.title: Professional Reports
reports.description: Complete comprehensive appraisal reports with ease. Auto-fill dynamic PDFs from major AMCs with our desktop plugin and leverage AI for faster professional report generation.

dataImport.title: Smart Data Import
dataImport.description: Import property data from MLS/Matrix PDFs or directly from MLS/Matrix listing websites with our browser extension. Our AI accurately extracts all relevant comparable data including municipality information and adds sale records to your library in seconds.

propertyLibrary.title: Property Library
propertyLibrary.description: Manage unlimited properties with advanced search, dynamic filters, and PDF/Excel exports. All your real estate data in one place.

inspections.title: Detailed Inspections
inspections.description: Conduct comprehensive room-by-room inspections with measurements and notes. Tablet-optimized interface with real-time progress tracking by category.

comparables.title: Comparable Analysis
comparables.description: Find and compare similar properties with ease. Key calculations done automatically for accurate and reliable appraisals.

dashboard.title: Performance Dashboard
dashboard.description: Track your appraisal activity and performance metrics. Analyze your property portfolio with real-time statistics and productivity insights.

screenshots.title: Discover the Interface
screenshots.subtitle: A modern and intuitive interface designed to maximize your productivity

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Professional appraisals made simple with AI-powered automation

step1.title: Build Your Property Library
step1.description: Manually create properties or import from existing data

step2.title: Use AI When You Need It
step2.description: Scan PDFs to extract property details (1 credit), import data from websites (1 credit), or generate report sections automatically (1 credit)

step3.title: Complete Inspections
step3.description: Tablet-optimized for field work (no credits needed)

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Automation, Pay As You Go
aiPowered.subtitle: Use AI to scan documents, extract data, and generate professional content. Each AI operation uses 1 credit (larger files 2MB+ may use 2-4 credits).

feature1.title: Scan PDFs
feature1.description: Extract property data automatically (1 credit per scan)

feature2.title: Import from URLs
feature2.description: Pull data from websites (1 credit per import)

feature3.title: AI-Generated Content
feature3.description: Auto-fill report sections with accuracy (1 credit per generation)

aiPowered.tagline: Credits power your AI assistant - use them when you need automation, skip them when you don't.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Valea Max and credits

q1.question: How do credits work?
q1.answer: Credits power your AI features. Each AI operation (PDF scan, website import, content generation) uses 1 credit. Larger files over 2MB may use 2-4 credits. You're in control - use AI when you need speed, enter data manually when you don't.

q2.question: Do credits expire?
q2.answer: No, credits never expire. Buy them once and use them whenever you need them.

q3.question: Can I use Valea Max without credits?
q3.answer: Yes! You can create properties, conduct inspections, and generate reports manually without using any credits. Credits are only needed for AI-powered automation features.

q4.question: What file formats are supported?
q4.answer: We support PDF documents for data extraction. You can also import data from MLS and real estate listing websites.
